title: Bug 110566: Incorrect data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0', the data set should either return a null result set or display a relevant error message.
OB: When previewing the data set after setting the filter 'row[0] equals to ', the first result record is being returned.
EB: Instead, a relevant error message should be displayed when an invalid filter expression like 'row[0] equals to ' is set.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, perform the following steps:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to '
2. Click on the Preview tab and observe the actual result.

Expected result: An error message should be displayed instead of the first result record.
